channel.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
channel.description:
[html]

Whonix is an operating system focused on anonymity, privacy and security. It’s based on the Tor anonymity network, Debian GNU/Linux and security by isolation. DNS leaks are impossible, and not even malware with root privileges can find out the user’s real IP.

Whonix consists of two parts: One solely runs Tor and acts as a gateway, which we call Whonix-Gateway. The other, which we call Whonix-Workstation, is on a completely isolated network. Only connections through Tor are possible.

Whonix for Qubes

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes

Whonix for KVM

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM

Whonix for VirtualBox

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox

If you want to upgrade existing Whonix version using Whonix’s APT repository

Special instructions required: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_10_to_Whonix_11

Edit 1: There will be no more support for upgrading Whonix 10 to Whonix 11 after October 17 2015.

If you want to upgrade existing Whonix version from source code

See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/BuildDocumentation.

If you want to build images from source code

See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/BuildDocumentation.

Call for Help

– If you know javascript, python, shell scripting (/bin/bash) and/or linux sysadmin, please join us! – Contribute: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute – Donate: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate

Changelog between Whonix 10 and Whonix 11

See following two blog posts that were calls for testing, these contain the changelogs. Whonix 11.0.0.3.0 has been blessed stable and released as Whonix 11.

– https://www.whonix.org/blog/whonix-11-testers-wanted – https://www.whonix.org/blog/testers-wanted-rc-11-0-0-3-0

Forum Discussion:

https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1520.0.html

[/html]

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I am still not sure we are not talking past each other.

Please post the exact gpg verify commands you entered the their output. In the following format.

gpg --verify Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent gpg: Signature made Mon 15 Jun 2015 10:03:19 PM UTC using RSA key ID 77BB3C48 gpg: Good signature from "Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net>" [ultimate]

gpg --verify Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent gpg: Signature made Mon 15 Jun 2015 10:35:33 PM UTC using RSA key ID 77BB3C48 gpg: Good signature from "Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net>" [ultimate]

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: abm
item.description:
OK - I now downloaded the following signatures:

https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.asc
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.asc

These DO check out successfully against the torrents.

So just to clarify, the following signatures DO NOT check out for the torrents:

https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc

They are the ones linked under the 2 Torrent Download links.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
And these signatures do check out?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: abm
item.description:
I downloaded the 2 torrents from the main download page, https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox#Landing :

https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent with
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc
&
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent with
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Workstation-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you download
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc
?
Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc can verify Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent

http://mirror.whonix.de/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova
https://www.whonix.org/download/11.0.0.3.0/Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.asc

Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.asc can verify Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova

Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova.torrent.asc cannot verify Whonix-Gateway-11.0.0.3.0.ova

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: abm
item.description:
Great news Patrick & thanks.

I’ve download the torrent version of the Gateway & Workstation Virtualbox appliances - both files’ hashes were fine - but when I verify with the signature - I get bad signature for both. I used command line & gui on Linux Mint 17.2 Cinnamon.

Any ideas? They both import & seem to work fine in VirtualBox.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!

item.title: Whonix Anonymous Operating System Version 11 Released!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Good question. Stable release announcements have always been posted in the support forum, because they apply to anyone. And because anyone before wondering about something should update to the latest version. I would hope people interested in development also read Whonix important blog https://www.whonix.org/blog/important [and more].

Read full topic
